title: For Sale:  COLT KING COBRA 4-Inch Stainless LNIB
postcontent: Here's a super clean Colt "Snake" revolver! This is a stainless steel King Cobra. This beauty is chambered for the .357 Magnum and wears the 4" full lug barrel. The sights are adjustable, the rear sight featuring the white outline blade, the front a ramp with red insert. Condition is close to new and the gun shows no wear aside from the usual cylinder turn line. There are no scratches or dings, no rust or pitting. If I had to pick a number I'd call this Colt 98%+. The original Colt medallion grips are in excellent shape with a few minor marks. The mechanics are in perfect working order and the bore is excellent as well. Mechanically, the King Cobra was essentially a stainless Trooper Mark V and was a heavy duty revolver made to take a steady diet of full power magnum cartridges. It appears this example has been fired but very little. It comes in the original plastic case with the outer sleeve which is serial numbered to the gun. The owner's manual and miscellaneous factory paperwork is included, According to Colt, this King Cobra was manufactured in 1996. A very nice example! Buyer pays $30.00 shipping. ask me if you have questions.

The compact, single-lithium-battery configuration leaves more rail space than ever for rear iron sights or magnifiers. This sight has the same body style as the XPS3â¢ model, but the XPS2 does not have night vision-compatibility.
